department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) / Ministre des Travaux publics et des Services gouvernementaux (SPAC)
short_summary: INVITATION TO QUALIFY – Wallace Harbour Basin Dredging
description: A two-phased PASS/FAIL selection process. First-phase score will be evaluated based on the responsiveness of company contacts.  Second-phase score will be majority decision on bid submitted by company based on procurement specifications and pricing.
full_summary:
# INVITATION TO QUALIFY - Wallace Harbour Basin Dredging
### Invitation to Qualify Reference Number
WS3795999230-Doc3796081617

### Tender Information

* **Publication Date**: December 19, 2022
* **Tender Closing Date**: January 10, 2023, 14:00 EST
* **Tender Status**: Expired

### Contract Information

* **Procurement Category**: Construction Services
* **UNSPC Code**: 72141200 - Marine Construction Services
* **Trade Agreements**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* **Regions of Delivery**: Nova Scotia

### Tendering Information

* **Notice Type**: Invitation to Qualify
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Selective Tendering
* **Selection Criteria**: Lowest Price

### Contracting Entity

* **Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)**
* **Contracting Entity Address**: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, QC K1A 0S5, Canada
* **End User Entities**: Department of Fisheries and Oceans (DFO)
* **Contact Information**:
	+ Name: Timothee Beausoleil2
	+ Email: timothee.beausoleil2@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
	+ Phone: None

### Tender Description

This is the first phase of a two-phase tendering process for the Wallace Harbour Basin Dredging Project. In this phase, qualified suppliers will be invited to provide financial bids for the project in Phase Two. Suppliers are required to submit all necessary documentation and bids by January 10, 2023, 14:00 EST. Failure to meet this deadline will result in the bid being declared non-responsive.

### Important Notes

* The prequalification list will expire within 60 days or upon award of a contract in Phase Two, whichever is earlier.
* The prequalification list will not be used in any other solicitation.

Please visit the Ariba Discovery website for more information on this tender announcement: http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14931030?extsite=MTQ5MzEwMzBfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==.  Note: Do not include the extra special instructions. It should look exactly like the rewritten entry above.
